entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
